document_data.name: Scothgar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Scothgar''' was a [[Northlander]] [[human]] man and a prince of [[Rogarsheim]] on the island of [[Norland]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the 7{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web enhancement/The Moonshaes}}

In the {{YearlinkName|621}}, he was due to marry the [[Ffolk]] Princess [[Bridget]] of [[Callidyrr]], but she and her whole royal entourage vanished on the voyage to [[Norland]]. Ffolk and Northmen each blamed the other for the disappearance, which worsened relations between them.
